import React from 'react'; const DashboardLayout = ({ children, onNavigate }) => { return (
{/* Sidebar */}

Campo Inteligente

{/* Main Content */}

Dashboard

Hola, Administrador
AD
{children}
); }; export default DashboardLayout;
